orthanc

The goal of orthanc is to provide programmatic access to the Orthanc DICOM Server REST API for the R language.

Installation

You can install the development version of orthanc from GitHub with:

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("mattwarkentin/orthanc")

Usage 

library(orthanc)

client <- Orthanc$new("https://orthanc.uclouvain.be/demo")

client$get_instances()
#> [[1]]
